article_title: Armchair Adventures: Take in African wildlife right in Arizona
article_text:
Thanks for reading Fredericksburg.com. This is your last free article on Fredericksburg.com this 30-day period. og.description: OUT OF AFRICA, an Arizona Wildlife Park, was entirely different than I had thought it would be. But when I think about that, I’m not at all sure what I thought it would be.
